LanguageData.VFES_SiegeEquipment.label: облогове обладнання
LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.label: окопна війна
LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.description: Adapt a trench warfare doctrine with a selection of weapons for close-quarters combat.
LanguageData.VFES_Artillery.label: артилерія
LanguageData.VFES_Artillery.description: Learn how to construct field artillery capable of bombarding distant targets within a location's region on the world.
LanguageData.VFES_SentryGuns.label: турелі
LanguageData.VFES_SentryGuns.description: Craft self-powered, reliable sentry guns to be utilised in the field.
LanguageData.VFES_ConcealedDefenses.label: прихований захист
LanguageData.VFES_ConcealedDefenses.description: Construct submersible barriers and turrets, perfect for indoor defenses.
LanguageData.VFES_PulseChargedDefenses.label: ЕМІ захист
LanguageData.VFES_PulseChargedDefenses.description: Develop advanced charge cannons capable of keeping consistent firing speed.
LanguageData.VFES_Railgun.label: рейкотрон
LanguageData.VFES_Railgun.description: Adapt spacecraft weaponry as part of your defensive systems.
LanguageData.VFES_EMPCannon.label: ЕМП гармата
LanguageData.VFES_EMPCannon.description: Develop EMP cannons, useful throughout the galaxy with it's ability to stun mechanoids.
LanguageData.VFES_RepulsorTechnology.label: репелентна технологія
LanguageData.VFES_RepulsorTechnology.description: Build shield generators that project energy fields capable of repelling projectiles.
